input.sentences: the sky began to turn grey .
the waves made a big splash against the rocks .
it looked as though it was about to rain .
he walked on the beach after the water began to calm down .
output.sentences: The ocean may sometimes seem at rest.
But the sky has eternally watched its advance.
Another wave lashed across the cliff.
Another ageless stone ground to amorphous shard.
Another stretch of lifetime swallowed by its insatiable maw.
